title: Putin says world faces most dangerous decade since WW2
description: In a speech, Russia's president claims the West is unable to stay in charge but is "desperately trying" to cling on. Also: live fire used again as Iran protests continue, and Nasa space probes witness big impact on Mars.
itunes:subtitle: The Russian leader also sought to justify the invasion of Ukraine
itunes:summary: In a speech, Russia's president claims the West is unable to stay in charge but is "desperately trying" to cling on. Also: live fire used again as Iran protests continue, and Nasa space probes witness big impact on Mars.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
